meanings.definition: A group of neurotransmitters, including dopamine, norepinephrine, and serotonin, that play a role in regulating mood and behavior.
meanings.sent1: The monamines in our brain affect how we feel.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study monamines to understand emotions better.
meanings.sent3: The monamines had a party in my head, making me feel happy.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a burst of monamines, spreading joy around.
meanings.sent5: Learning about monamines made me appreciate the complexity of the brain.

meanings.definition: Any of various compounds containing a single amino group.
meanings.sent1: Scientists are researching the properties of monamines.
meanings.sent2: Monamines are important building blocks in chemistry.
meanings.sent3: The monamines in the solution seemed to dance under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: His words were like monamines, simple yet essential for understanding.
meanings.sent5: The smell of monamines in the lab reminded me of my high school experiments.
